TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit GroupBoxRenderer extends System.Object
public ref class GroupBoxRenderer abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GroupBoxRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于呈现具有或没有视觉样式的分组框控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a group box control with or without visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一组 `static` 可用于呈现分组框控件的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a group box control. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 若要绘制分组框，请使用其中一种 方法。To draw a group box, use one of the methods. 这些方法提供了各种文本绘图选项。These methods provide a variety of text drawing options. 如果在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于当前应用程序， 将用当前视觉样式绘制组框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, will draw the group box with the current visual style. 否则， 将用经典 Windows 样式绘制组框。Otherwise, will draw the group box with the classic Windows style. 如果要绘制的自定义控件应自动匹配操作系统的当前视觉样式设置，这将很有用。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should automatically match the current visual style setting of the operating system. 此类包装 设置为类公开的元素之一的的功能 。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [用视觉样式呈现控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个自定义控件，该控件使用 方法在启用了视觉样式的情况下使用双边框绘制组框。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the method to draw a group box with a double border if visual styles are enabled. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

span.span: Draws a group box control.

The that specifies the bounds of the group box.

param.name: state
param.span: 指定分组框可视状态的 值之一。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the visual state of the group box.

summary.span: 绘制具有指定状态和边界的分组框控件。

span.span: Draws a group box control in the specified state and bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于当前应用程序，则此方法将用当前视觉样式绘制组框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the group box with the current visual style. 否则，此方法将用经典 Windows 样式绘制组框。Otherwise, this method will draw the group box with the classic Windows style. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 自定义控件的方法中的方法 来绘制具有双边框的分组框。The following code example uses the method in a custom control's method to draw a group box with a double border. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示呈现器是否使用应用程序状态来确定呈现样式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the renderer uses the application state to determine rendering style.

value.span: 如果使用应用程序状态确定呈现样式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application state is used to determine rendering style; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 `true` ，则 使用中的设置 来确定呈现样式。If is `true`, the uses the setting from to determine the rendering style. 如果 为 `false` ，则呈现器将始终使用视觉样式呈现。If is `false`, the renderer will always render using visual styles. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性来更改是否使用视觉样式呈现组框。The following code example uses the property to change whether a group box is rendered using visual styles. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#3)]
